item.description:
Hey gang,
I know we have plenty of women running this Columbus Day race.
Now, the guys can participate too! We will support 'our ladies' by
manning a water stop on the course! We did this last year and it was a
ton of fun!! (Tuxedos and Ball Gowns optional).
If you like having tons of fun and supporting your fellow runners then let us know! (contact info below)
Details for sign to follow. Ladies, if your not running but want to participate
in the fun, then you can volunteer too!!

See you there!

Please Contact:

Scott Platt
(704) 661-5166

msplatt3@gmail.com
msplatt3@hotmail.com

or:

Andy Marx
(631) 926-0643

colsanders829@gmail.com

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: ***Calling all Informal Volunteers for the Tufts 10k for Women***
